author: Simon Difford
description: Fruity and refreshing yet complex and fairly dry with underlying bitterness.
name: Garibaldino
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur
10 ml Tangerine / Mandarin / Clementine juice (fresh juice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
